title: My Ziggs-O-Lantern
body:
Here is my Ziggs Pumpkin Carving 

I did this within 2 hours with minimum tools 

Luckily i didnt cut myself 
Had alot of fun doing it too ^_^


Tell me what do you think about it :D 
Hope you enjoy 
And
Happy Halloween ! {{champion:115}}
See You next year again !

replies.body: the nose is awesome :D would need a wider smile though.
